Subject: Re: Jewish Baseball Players? Lines: 7 Date: Fri, 16 Apr 1993 07:13:45 GMT
There was an article on Jewish major leaguers in a recent issue of "Elysian Fields", what used to be the "Minnesota Review of Baseball". As I recall, it had an amazing amount of research, with a long list of players and a large bibliography.
